name: 2gis-playable
description: HTML5 playable ad for 2GIS with 3D map navigation

scripts.build:mintegral-portrait: cross-env AD_NETWORK=mintegral ORIENTATION=portrait npm run build
scripts.build:mintegral-landscape: cross-env AD_NETWORK=mintegral ORIENTATION=landscape npm run build
scripts.build:unity-portrait: cross-env AD_NETWORK=unity ORIENTATION=portrait npm run build
scripts.build:unity-landscape: cross-env AD_NETWORK=unity ORIENTATION=landscape npm run build
scripts.build:bigo-portrait: cross-env AD_NETWORK=bigo ORIENTATION=portrait npm run build
scripts.build:bigo-landscape: cross-env AD_NETWORK=bigo ORIENTATION=landscape npm run build
